input.sentences: there was a display against domestic violence in town today .
it had very interesting works done by women victims of domestic violence .
there were so many brave women who took the time to display their emotions .
many of them wrote their stories on shirts .
they were very inspiring how brave they were and that they never quit .
output.sentences: My daughter had a school art project to imagine a T-shirt she would like to have, and put whatever she would want it to say on it.
She was so passionate about the project, I decided to see if I could find something similar, that I could surprise her with at our locale store.
After I spent a long time searching through all their available T-shirts, I was unable to find the perfect thing in her size.

On my way back to the car I saw a sheet some one had hung up as a sign, AND since she had been re-decorating her room with posters and murals, it helped me come up with a genius idea as an alternative.
Using a white bed sheet, I created a mural for her bedroom wall, depicting her beautiful saying in rainbow writing... and she LOVED it!!
